entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
